title: ESS插件问题
author: 834948283s
txt_content: ESS插件如何取消玩家的hat，nick还有彩字权限啊[diamond_gem]还有ESS能BAN带有附加值。。比如骨粉这样的物品吗→_→

replies.author: xiaonuonuo
replies.txt_content:
取消彩字权限输入指令 /mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.color
取消hat权限 输入指令 /mangaddp builder -essentials.hat
取消nick权限 输入指令 /mangaddp builder -essentials.nick

replies.author: 834948283s
replies.txt_content:
xiaonuonuo 发表于 2016-1-26 11:36
取消彩字权限输入指令 /mangaddp builder -essentials.chat.color
取消hat权限 输入指令 /mangaddp builder ...
前面要加个-号吗
